<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Sun Jun 22 23:55:15 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="montecarlo" node_id="2113371" parent_e2node="162337" author_user="Bitriot">stainless steel</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2113714" parent_e2node="1702332" author_user="rootbeer277">It doesn't DO anything. That's the beauty of it!</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2113713" parent_e2node="2113710" author_user="etouffee">and these clotheslines, bare</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="iceowl" node_id="1691008" parent_e2node="735323" author_user="Jack">OK, so I'm a fuckup, and it's Tuesday</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Clockmaker" node_id="1698714" parent_e2node="1698712" author_user="artman2003">An important letter to all Citizens of the Galactic Empire from Grand Emperor Zadnariak</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="momomom" node_id="2113632" parent_e2node="2113630" author_user="Tem42">Inksplot</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Mister Chu" node_id="1037899" parent_e2node="44458" author_user="nikka">charity</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1210004" parent_e2node="73558" author_user="BaronWR">Wormwood</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="2113407" parent_e2node="2113666" author_user="iceowl">The most fun I've had doing anything</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Everyone2" node_id="2113701" parent_e2node="2113702" author_user="JD">Soeur Sourire</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="1009995" parent_e2node="1009993" author_user="Grzcyrgba">Victory Garden</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Auduster" node_id="2113680" parent_e2node="2113681" author_user="IWhoSawTheFace">The completely wrong way of removing a tick</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="1814810" parent_e2node="479222" author_user="sam512">models of fictional time travel physics</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="507797" parent_e2node="507780" author_user="ideath">ideath: word salad</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2113682" parent_e2node="2113679" author_user="Glowing Fish">Shot Clock Era</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
